text: Alberto José Fanesi (born 16 February 1948 in Casilda, Santa Fe) is an Argentine footballer manager and former player. As a player, he won the Argentine championship with three teams. ==Titles== {| class="wikitable" !Season !Team !Title |- |1971 Nacional|| Rosario Central|| Primera División Argentina |- |1973 Metropolitano|| Huracán|| Primera División Argentina |- |1978 Metropolitano|| Quilmes|| Primera División Argentina |- |} ==Coaching career== He has coached at Gimnasia La Plata, Huracan, Vélez Sársfield, Quilmes and Unión de Mar del Plata. ==References== ==External links== * Managerial statistics in Argentina * Interview with La Nacion Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:People from Casilda Category:Sportspeople from Santa Fe Province Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Argentine Primera División players Category:Rosario Central footballers Category:Club Atlético Huracán footballers Category:Quilmes footballers Category:Argentine football managers Category:Gimnasia y Esgrima de La Plata managers Category:Club Atlético Huracán managers Category:Quilmes managers Category:Club Atlético Vélez Sarsfield managers
title: Alberto Fanesi
